professional_summary: Experienced Systems Engineer with expertise in global environment implementation, backup support, and client-facing consulting. Skilled in managing AD servers, network infrastructure, NAS/SAN storage, and virtual environments.

key_responsibilities: Built global environments following best practices.
Provided backup support and maintained operations.
Delivered presales support and implementation during business commitments.
Deployed and managed workstations and servers across environments.
Managed multiple Active Directory servers for clients.
Deployed network infrastructure across switches.
Managed NAS and SAN storage systems using various vendors.
Migrated on-premise deployments to cloud solutions.
Managed virtual environments and provided DR best practices.
Deployed and managed security software.
Implemented HPC cluster deployment.
Managed Windows and Linux server environments.
Conducted IT infrastructure assessments.
Provided support for users and software.
Deployed OS images and migrations across versions.
Managed Active Directory users.
Managed NAS storage shares.
Deployed and decommissioned hardware using best practices.

work_experience.company: Southeast Texas Industries - Southeast, TX, US
key_responsibilities: Maintained node software and hardware.
Deployed software installations and managed licensing.
Compiled inventory data and reported inconsistencies.

education.degree: Associate of Applied Science in Computer Network Engineering
